meanings.sent1: The children's rambunctiousness during recess made it hard for the teacher to keep them in line.
meanings.sent2: The puppy's rambunctiousness was evident as it ran around the yard, chasing its tail.
meanings.sent3: Despite their small size, the kittens' rambunctiousness turned the living room into a playful chaos.
meanings.sent4: The rambunctiousness of the storm caused trees to sway violently in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The rambunctiousness of the crowd at the concert added to the excitement of the event.

meanings.definition: The state or quality of being wild or disorderly
meanings.sent1: The forest's rambunctiousness was a sight to behold, with trees growing in all directions.
meanings.sent2: The party's rambunctiousness reached its peak when the music got louder and the dancing more energetic.
meanings.sent3: The rambunctiousness of the traffic during rush hour made the commute home a stressful experience.
meanings.sent4: The rambunctiousness of the ocean during the storm made it impossible to go sailing.
meanings.sent5: The rambunctiousness of the market on weekends created a vibrant and bustling atmosphere.
